name: Component Cross-Reference Validity
description: Component tokens that reference other component tokens (--dsa-* cross-references) must point to real, existing component tokens. Invalid cross-references create phantom token chains.
rule: When a component token's value contains var(--dsa-*), the referenced token must exist in the component token files. Cross-component references are a valid pattern (e.g., a hero referencing headline tokens), but the target must exist.

examples.valid: var(--dsa-headline--color) — references an existing headline token
examples.invalid: var(--dsa-nonexistent--color) — references a component token that doesn't exist
